item.description:
Hey Everyone, I'm back from my 7 weeks in China.  Let's get our Wednesday thing back together so that we're rolling when Sheng gets back too :)

Our next evening meet up will be

LOCATION: Borders Books store in downtown boston (Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.)  

Can anyone confirm whether Borders downtown crossing is officially closed or not?

TIME: from 6:30 to 8:30PM. Food and drinks available here.

NOTE: Some people have expressed interest in going out for dinner as a group afterwards so If you have any interest in that we may try to head over to Chinatown for a bite.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

We'd really like to make this meetup work for you. Please feel free to take our survey and share your thoughts with us at the meetup or via email.

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
